Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier medical emergency on the tracks at 47th. Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier medical emergency on the tracks near 47th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
